name: Small Business
description: Customization, Clicking, and Expansion? That’s right it’s all in this game. Small Business is a game where you are able to create and customize your very own product and then click on your new product to earn money. With your stacks of money you can buy upgrades. While you do whatever it is you do while playing the Small Business you can jam out to 10 different original songs. Enjoy! :D
